CustomField.formula:
IF(
AND(
Asset.Source_System__c = 'A3S',
OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'IVR-no email'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'RM-no email'))),
'a3s_rm',
IF(
AND(
Asset.Source_System__c='A3S',
ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Others')),
'a3s',
IF(
AND(
Asset.Source_System__c='FINNRTL',
OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'IVR-no email'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'RM-no email'))),
'finnone_rm',
IF(
AND(
Asset.Source_System__c='FINNRTL',
ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Others')),
'finnone',
IF(
AND(
Asset.Source_System__c='FINNCORP',
OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'IVR-no email'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'RM-no email'))
),
'corporate_rm',
IF(
AND(
Asset.Source_System__c='FINNCORP',
ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Others')
),
'corporate',
IF(
AND(
Asset.Source_System__c='MINACS',
OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'IVR-no email'),ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'RM-no email'))
),
'corporate_rm',
IF(
AND(
Asset.Source_System__c='MINACS',
ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Others')),
'corporate',
NULL
))))))))
CustomField.label: BRE Source
